ABOUT US

STEM Coders is a students club which brings people together to harness the opportunities to engage in ICT through our learn-through-execution system. Its a platform geared towards harmonizing various human resources needed for a vibrant ICT driven society. As deep technologies are taking over human jobs today, its incumbent upon us to equip our future generations with the necessary knowledge & skills needed to control the system.
